1.description: Stage 1: Search the source tubes. Search the order. Assign a batch to the source tubes.

2.description: Stage 2: Build and start the order

3.description:
Stage 3: Create binding_spin_columns_dna spin columns. Create by_product_tube tubes.
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna and by_product_tube tubes.

4.description:
Stage 4: Use the binding_spin_column_dna spins in a new role elution_spin_column_dna.
Then transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

5.description: Stage 5: Create new tube_to_be_extracted tube. Transfer from by_product_tube into tube_to_be_extracted.

6.description:
Stage 6: Create binding_spin_column_rna spins. Create by_product_tube tubes. 
Transfer tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna and into by_product_tube.

7.description:
Stage 7: Use the binding_spin_column_rna spins in a new role elution_spin_column_rna.
Then transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

8.description: Stage 8: Change the status of the order to completed.
